H0.text: Which car manufacturer originally made the model known as the Matiz. Fiat

H1.text: Which car manufacturer originally made the model known as the Matiz. Suzuki

H2.text: Which car manufacturer originally made the model known as the Matiz. Hyundai

H3.text: Which car manufacturer originally made the model known as the Matiz. 대우

A4.text: The Matiz was introduced by Daewoo in 1998.

A5.text: The Matiz was assembled in a joint venture between Daewoo and FSO in Poland.
